update package name in AndroidManifest.xml (#229)

* test: update unit test.

removed the private access modifier for methods that are accessed from inner classes ( now they're package-local ). This alleviates the need for the compiler to create extra synthetic accessor methods, reducing dex method count. (#79)
Fix unit tests in master branch. (#143)

Update project dependencies (#122)

* Update Gradle wrapper to 3.4

* Update build dependencies

- Update Android Gradle plugin to 2.3.0
- Update build tools to 25.0.2
- Update support libs to 25.2.0

* Fix Lint warnings

Change behavior when subject not found (fix #106)

Log an error rather than throw an exception. Despite multiple attempt
to handle all the cases where the subject cannot be found, I finally
give up and remove the exception.
onResume shouldn't be used for requesting permission (fix #98)
Remove RxPermissions.newInstance(this) in favor of a public constructor.
Fix NPE on getActivity() and code refactoring.
Fix NPE and move permissions state to fragment.
Initialize singleton along with fragment to update reference by activity.
Use master branch for travis badge
Use master branch for travis badge
Ask shouldShow after the permission request
Move hacky code in specific subclass (#46)
Up to 0.7.1 and README for rxjava2 version
Up to 0.7.1 and README for rxjava2 version
Add info about init phase requirement

Update Gradle wrapper to 2.14.1

This also updates the android-maven-gradle-plugin.

Merge pull request #58 from jvbreen1/fix_typos

Fix some typos

Fix #43 and remove dumb feature

See README diff to see what feature is removed.

Fix #42 #44

Revert too greedy refactor done in
740578ca85c349c33223bc309ac9b949523f7644
Fix #40 onDestroy should not be used
Remove static scope to facilitate mocking
Rename methods, comments and update scope
Adapt tests: Removed assertTerminalEvent() and assertUnsubscribed() after onDestroy() call. Add returnDefaultValues option to gradle config, otherwise tests would fail (even before my changes).
Allow fix to work with configuration changes.
rename lib project, apply scripts and default values
new scripts for creating pom and uploading to bintray

Revert remove onDestroy

Because it breaks config change handling.
Readded onDestroy() in RxPermissions, but don't call in ShadowActivity's onDestroy() â€“ fixes tests.
Remove onDestroy callbacks: Fixes bug when retrying permission request without trigger would only return onComplete() without emiting any item.

Merge pull request #27 from PavelSynek/rxjava110

RxJava 1.1.0
Use PublishSubject to check if there are pending requests

Merge pull request #24 from obviousengineering/issue-23

Add check for isPermissionRevokedByPolicy, #23

Don't ask the framework for granted permissions

Because else if case of multiple permissions, the granted permissions will be asked again...
Downgrade build tool to make Travis CI succeed

Fix bug in shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale

Invoke activity.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale only for revoked permissions.

Merge pull request #18 from vanniktech/master_readme_fix

Fix RxView.clicks return type in README
Fix RxView.clicks return type in README
Allow shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale to ask multiple permissions
Be clear about must use in init phase
Replace toList() (aka the fake friend) to buffer()

Remove take(1) from oneOf

Because it prevents multiple event on the trigger. For instance if the
user denies a request and ask again for it (via the trigger), it won't
work.

The caveat is request method don't work anymore, because of the toList
which requires a onComplete to works properly. The next fix will concern
that.

Permission request on app start

For that kind of request, there is no need of trigger parameter.

Remove Navi usage in sample

Great lib but as a sample app it needs to be more readable as possible.
Improve flatMap of List<Permission> to Boolean
Check grant must be in the observable sequence
Integrate the merge in the library
Add pending method to properly handle config changes

Lifecycle handling

- Makes ShadowActivity reorder on top when started twice
- Communicate onDestroy to singleton, makes singleton completes all its
  subjects
Add RequestEach to observe detailed permission answers

Basic support for shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale (Fix #8)

Simply add a new method which returns an observable and handles sdk
version.
This observable can be mixed with the request's one, like done in the
sample app.

Fix onRequestPermissionsResult scope

Since this method is called by an internal activity, it shouldn't be visible
from outside the package.

Merge pull request #7 from egor-n/patch-1

Fix a typo in README

Use a shadow activity

So the user doesn't have to invoke onRequestPermissionsResult()
